Data Fields
am_hal_uart_stream_state_t Struct Reference
mcu » apollo330P » UART Stream Functionality

Detailed Description

Structure for holding UART HAL state information. Used internally, allocated in application No user-modifiable variables here

Data Fields

am_hal_handle_prefix_t prefix
 For internal verification purposes.
 
am_hal_uart_register_state_t sRegState
 Saved register state for power-up/power-down.

 UART module number.

Field Documentation

◆ bBusyWaitEnabled

bool am_hal_uart_stream_state_t::bBusyWaitEnabled

Busy wait, use as a flag in the ISR service, this is not a setting.

◆ eStreamingDmaMode

am_hal_uart_streaming_dma_mode_e am_hal_uart_stream_state_t::eStreamingDmaMode

◆ eTxCompleteNotificationEnabled

am_hal_uart_stream_tx_complete_options_t am_hal_uart_stream_state_t::eTxCompleteNotificationEnabled

In ISR service this keeps track of requests for a tx callback At the end of the ISR service, if this is non-zero, and a callback function is defined. The callback function is called this is not a setting

◆ prefix

am_hal_handle_prefix_t am_hal_uart_stream_state_t::prefix

For internal verification purposes.

◆ psActiveState

bool am_hal_uart_stream_state_t::psActiveState

Contains computed config data (baud rate, clock)

◆ sDmaQueue

am_hal_uart_dma_config_t am_hal_uart_stream_state_t::sDmaQueue

Pointer to the dma buffer descriptor queue This is allocated by the calling function in application space and is attached to this struct via a call to am_hal_uart_stream_dmaQueueInit

Note
Since it is allocated and passed in, this usually shouldn't be on the stack
